channel.title: The SILOE Project
channel.description: Scientists have pointed some of the most advanced technology towards the heavens in the search for intelligent life on other planets. So far, however, there is little evidence of intelligence even here on Earth. This website serves as a chronicle of the brave men and women who hope to someday find such intelligence. The search continues...

item.title: SILOE: The Search for Intelligent Life on Earth
item.description: Scientists have pointed some of the most advanced technology towards the heavens in the search for intelligent life on other planets. So far, however, there...
